name: TREC-ITP - B1101A - Te Ngarue Bridge - Asphalt - Surfacing (AC 14)
template name: TREC-ITP - B1101A - Te Ngarue Bridge - Asphalt - Surfacing (AC 14)

name: 1 - Installation of Erosion and Sediment Controls
Detail - Monitor effectiveness of the ESCP Controls throughout the construction process
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - All previous Activities completed & signed off before Surfacing Asphalt laying commences
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Previous ITP must be completed
Detail - Set out pegs installed every 20m if required
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Detail - Determine paving run start/stop locations
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Conformance Criteria - Mark out on site
Detail - Mix Design approved including peer review
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Material is approved by a Notice to Supplier being issued
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing

Conformance Criteria - Fine and Coarse aggregate Weathering, Crushing, Sand Equivalent, Broken faces, PSD, PSV. Bitumen testing, Penetration @ 25 degrees Celsius, Dynamic Viscosity at 60 degrees Celsius
Detail - Full volumetric and air voids test 1 test - 1 test per day, Binder content and grading 1 test per 100t.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing and measurements
Conformance Criteria - Binder content, PSD, Mix Volumetric, Mix performance related properties resilient Modulus and wheel tracking, mix production temperature and load out temperature
Detail - A Spray sheet for every day
Frequency - Prior to placing Surfacing AC
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measure
Conformance Criteria - Showing the required spray rate 0.2 L/m2 with a tolerance of +or- 0.1 L/m2
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Site Measurements
Conformance Criteria - Delivery temperature, mat thickness before compaction, mix temperature during compaction
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection

Conformance Criteria - No visible cracks, No obvious defect related to poorly constructed joins, No areas where water can pool; No part of all pavement surfaces deviate more than 5mm from a 2m straight edge lying under its own weight on the road surface parallel to or perpendicular to the road centreline.
Detail - Red pen mark up drawings to be included in QA file
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Drawings
